85942.name: Share of wealth held by top 1% (Chartbook of Economic Inequality 2017)
85942.description: Share of wealth held by top 1% of individuals (Finland, France, New Zealand, UK, US), or households (Australia, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Switzerland). (Sweden individuals post-2000 and households before; Spain, unknown unit of analysis).
85942.datasetName: Top 1% wealth shares - Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017)

source.name: Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Atkinson, Hasell, Morelli, and Roser (2017), “The Chartbook of Economic Inequality”
